description: Cloud Storage events describe Cloud Storage Activities. e.g. (AWS S3, GCP Cloud Storage, Azure Blob Storage)
caption: Cloud Storage Activity
name: cloud_storage

1.caption: Data Container Creation
1.description: The event pertains to the creation of a data container.

2.caption: Data Container Deletion
2.description: The event pertains to the creation of a data container.

3.caption: Upload
3.description: The event pertains to the upload of data to a container.

4.caption: Download
4.description: The event pertains to the download of data to a container.

5.caption: Enumeration
5.description: The event pertains to enumeration of data/storage containers.

6.caption: Policy Changes
6.description: The event pertains to data storage policy changes .

7.caption: Permission Changes
7.description: The event pertains to data storage permission changes .

8.caption: Encryption
8.description: The event pertains to data encryption.

9.caption: Decryption
9.description: The event pertains to data decryption.

path.description: The full path within the data container corresponding to current activity.
